name: Focando
description: Real Estate News Portal from Brazil.
overview:
The Real Estate World in one Click Distance.

Focando brings news from the brazillian real estate market from the main media vehicles. The brazillian real estate market is one of the main investment targets in Brazil, a country that is marked by investors and economists as one of the main targets of investments in the world.

Focando brings to users many ways to get the main market news. By email, RSS feed, twitter, facebook or linkedin, our users also have a 100% customizable environment that allow users to select which categories to follow, and even the option to move the news board through the screen.

We also provide exclusive articles, written by the main autorities in Brazillian real estate market, and a video collection from brazillian television channels.

Besides the fact that Focando is a website that looks mainly for Brazillian Market, a international section is also available to report what happens in international real estate market.

Because of the importance of Brazil in world economy, Focando has users from all around the globe, especially Portugal, Spain and USA.
